data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 2, Throw-in high up the field for Monaco in Dijon-Prenois.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
At Stade Gaston Gerard, Mounir Chouiar has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Free kick for Dijon in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 10, Free kick Dijon.
Jeremy Stinat awards Monaco a goal kick.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to Monaco.
Jeremy Stinat awards the home team a throw-in.
Kevin Volland puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 15, Wissam Ben Yedder with an assist there.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Monaco awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Monaco.
Dijon have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Dijon's Bruno Ecuele attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 20, Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Dijon have a goal kick.
In the minute 24, In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Jeremy Stinat signals a Dijon throw-in in Monaco's half.
In the minute 25, Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Monaco.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Aurelien Tchouameni (Monaco) has received a yellow card from Jeremy Stinat.
In the minute 27, In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Aurelien Tchouameni gets his shot on target but fails to score for Monaco.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Attention is being given to Dijon’s Mounir Chouiar and play has been suspended briefly.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
In the minute 32, Throw-in Dijon.
Dijon are whistled for offside.
Mounir Chouiar has recovered and rejoins the match in Dijon-Prenois.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Monaco in their own half.
Throw-in for Monaco at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, It's a goal kick for the home team in Dijon-Prenois.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Monaco.
Dijon's Didier Ndong has been booked in Dijon-Prenois.
In the minute 38, Monaco surge into the attack at Stade Gaston Gerard but Guillermo Maripan’s header is off-target.
Jeremy Stinat awards Dijon a goal kick.
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Dijon in the half of Monaco.
Dijon push upfield but Jeremy Stinat quickly pulls them for offside.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 44, Jeremy Stinat signals a Dijon throw-in in Monaco's half.
Dijon to take a throw-in in Monaco territory.
Mihai Dobre (Dijon) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 44, Monaco have a goal kick.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Gelson Martins of Monaco smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
In the minute 45, Monaco are coming forward and Aurelien Tchouameni gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Dijon-Prenois.
Jeremy Stinat blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Jeremy Stinat has blown to start the second-half.
Goal kick for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 46, Dijon have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Dijon advance rapidly upfield but Jeremy Stinat blows for offside.
In the minute 48, Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Jeremy Stinat awards Monaco a goal kick.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the home team in Dijon-Prenois.
Dijon are pushing forward but Moussa Konate's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
In the minute 51, Throw-in Dijon.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
Dijon are coming forward and Bersant Celina gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 58, Can Dijon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Eric Ebimbe of Dijon gets in a strike, but is off target.
Jeremy Stinat awards Monaco a goal kick.
In the minute 60, Ball safe as Monaco is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team have replaced Mounir Chouiar with Mama Balde. This is the first substitution made today by David Linares.
Dijon's Mihai Dobre gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 61, Goal kick for Monaco at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Jeremy Stinat awards the away team a throw-in.
Monaco have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
In the minute 62, In Dijon-Prenois Monaco drive forward through Benoit Badiashile. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Monaco have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Monaco.
In the minute 65, Monaco make their first substitution with Willem Geubbels replacing Wissam Ben Yedder.
Stevan Jovetic is replacing Sofiane Diop for Monaco at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Can Monaco get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
In the minute 66, Monaco's Youssouf Fofana breaks free at Stade Gaston Gerard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Throw-in for Monaco in their own half.
In the minute 67, Can Dijon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Monaco's half?
Free kick in a good position for Dijon!
Eric Ebimbe (Dijon) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the away team in Dijon-Prenois.
Monaco to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
Monaco drives forward and Kevin Volland gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 70, Monaco awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Pape Diop is replacing Moussa Konate for the home team.
Free kick Monaco.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Dijon at Stade Gaston Gerard.
Monaco's Stevan Jovetic goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Jeremy Stinat awards Monaco a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Mihai Dobre is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Dijon's Eric Ebimbe breaks free at Stade Gaston Gerard. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Dijon-Prenois.
David Linares is making the team's third substitution at Stade Gaston Gerard with Frederic Sammaritano replacing Mihai Dobre.
In the minute 80, Jeremy Stinat awards the home team a throw-in.
In Dijon-Prenois a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
In the minute 81, Dijon have been awarded a corner by Jeremy Stinat.
Dijon's Bruno Ecuele attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Monaco have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Djibril Sidibe is on a sub for Gelson Martins for Monaco.
Jeremy Stinat signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Monaco goal kick.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Dijon.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Djibril Sidibe.
The match at Stade Gaston Gerard has been interrupted briefly for a check on Pape Diop, who is down injured.
In the minute 87, Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dijon's Pape Diop looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Monaco’s Djibril Sidibe is on his feet again at Stade Gaston Gerard.
In the minute 87, Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jeremy Stinat signals a Dijon throw-in in Monaco's half.
Monaco needs to be cautious. Dijon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 89, Free kick for Dijon in the half of Monaco.
Throw-in for Dijon in the half of Monaco.
Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jeremy Stinat will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Monaco.
Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Dijon's Eric Ebimbe gets in a shot on goal at Stade Gaston Gerard. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Monaco drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
Niko Kovac (Monaco) is making a fourth substitution, with Pietro Pellegri replacing Kevin Volland.
Niko Kovac (Monaco) is making a fifth substitution, with Strahinja Pavlovic replacing Caio Henrique.
